customTypes: Custom Types, e.g. `{ "customType": "(customType) custom type description" }`
jira.prefix: Jira project prefix, only valid when `#gitCommitMessage.jira.enable#` is picked, e.g. PROJECT-
jira.url: Jira URL, only valid when `#gitCommitMessage.jira.enable#` is picked, e.g. https://jira.sample.com/browse/
name: Name
reporters:
Reporters
- `name`: Reporter's name
- `email`: Reporter's email
- `picked`: Picked default

```json
[
  { "name": "Reporter", "email": "reporter@sample.com", "picked": true }
]
```
reporters.name: Reporter's name
reviewers:
Reviewers
- `name`: Reviewer's name
- `email`: Reviewer's email
- `picked`: Picked default

```json
[
  { "name": "Reviewer", "email": "reviewer@sample.com", "picked": true }
]
```
reviewers.name: Reviewer's name
signer.name: Signer's name
